snippet.title: Blood Bowl 3 | PC Beta Trailer
snippet.description:
Register for the beta on https://bloodbowl-thegame.com/

Six playable factions are coming in new Blood Bowl 3 Beta (June 1-12): the Black Orcs, the Imperial Nobility, the Elven Union, the Dwarfs and two new factions, which will be appearing for the first time in a Blood Bowl® video game. The new beta phase also marks the arrival of new pitches, each with special rules that will spice up the matches!

#BloodBowl3 will be available on PC, PlayStation®4, PlayStation®5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S and Nintendo Switch™ in 2022.
-------------------------------
For news about our other games and products, you can also follow us on: 

Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/NaconGaming 
Instagram ► https://www.instagram.com/NaconGaming
